description: The Mint Corporation, through its subsidiaries, provides vertically integrated prepaid card and payroll services primarily in the Middle East. It manages the issuance, administration, customer support, payment processing, set-up, sponsorship, and regulated reporting of cards and related activities to government authorities. The company also offers point of sale terminals, mobile airtime top-up, and merchant network solutions, as well as engages in insurance brokerage and salary advance programs. It offers its solutions through a network of ATMs, payment processing platforms, and branded card products. The company was formerly known as Mint Technology Corp. and changed its name to The Mint Corporation in August 2013. The Mint Corporation was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
